definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: WuHuaLan first time to call shunde, the report good thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 吳華蘭第一時間打電話給順德，報告好音訊。

sentences.english: B- I'm excited by the news.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這個音訊，我很興奮。

sentences.english: Lost pendant BaiXi bad words after the start time, BaiXi suspicious huimei.
sentences.chinese: 丟了吊墜後的白熙壞音訊不時，白熙開端疑心惠美。

sentences.english: You can go to the "Hong Kong was very hot audio" look.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去“香襲人音訊港”看看。

sentences.english: Information technology will be at the heart of global economic competition in the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 音訊技術將成爲21世紀全球經濟合做的核口。

sentences.english: It's been six months and still no word - I don't deserve it?
sentences.chinese: 六個月過去毫無音訊，難道是我沒有資格嗎？

sentences.english: There has been almost complete radio silence on trade and open investment .
sentences.chinese: 對於貿易和開放性投資已經是杳無音訊了。

sentences.english: However, Wang Ting lost all contact with his family after the operation. Shiang Shiang missed him very much.
sentences.chinese: 可惜手術之後，王亭就音訊全無，湘湘非常想念他。

sentences.english: Her niece had been searching fruitlessly for her every day since March 12th.
sentences.chinese: 3月12日以來雖然她每天都在尋找，但卻毫無音訊。

sentences.english: The text of the kidnapped thereafter reached the nanyang, zhaoqing supplications ZhuJin assistance.
sentences.chinese: 端文被綁架的音訊傳到了南洋，肇慶懇求朱瑾協助。

sentences.english: Her face lighted up at the good news.
sentences.chinese: 她聽到這好音訊臉上顯露了憂色。

sentences.english: I haven't heard any news from my son lately.
sentences.chinese: 我最近沒聽到我兒子的任何音訊。

sentences.english: I haven't heard from you all these years, where have you been?
sentences.chinese: 這些年你都音訊全無，到底去了哪裏？

sentences.english: In fact, I had not seen hide nor hair of him in months.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，幾個月來他都杳無音訊。

sentences.english: He always keeps a close eye on latest domestic news.
sentences.chinese: 他密切的關口國內最舊的音訊。

sentences.english: The years rolled by and still there was no news whatsoever about him.
sentences.chinese: 幾年過去了，關於他的情況仍杳無音訊。

definition: lit. to thread a needle (idiom); fig. to act as a go-between
anew/from the beginning/(in poetry and song) repetition of a melody or rhythm
use both carrot and stick/use gentle methods and force/an iron hand in a velvet glove
